com.bumptech.glide.loader.image
Interface ImageLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageManagerLoader
public interface ImageLoader

An interface used by ImagePresenter to load a bitmap.

Nested Class Summary
static interface ImageLoader.ImageReadyCallback
          An interface defining a callback that will be passed to an ImageLoader and that should be called by the ImageLoader when a load completes either successfully or because of an exception.
 
Method Summary
 void clear()
          Called when the current image load does not need to continue and any corresponding cleanup to save cpu or memory can be done.
 java.lang.Object fetchImage(BitmapLoadTask loadTask, ImageLoader.ImageReadyCallback cb)
          Loads the image using the given load task.
 

Method Detail

fetchImage

java.lang.Object fetchImage(BitmapLoadTask loadTask,
                            ImageLoader.ImageReadyCallback cb)
Loads the image using the given load task.

Parameters:
loadTask - The BitmapLoadTask that defines the image and decoder to use to retrieve a bitmap if the image is not cached.
cb - The callback to call when the bitmap is loaded into memory, or when a load fails.
Returns:
A reference to the fetch that must be retained by the calling object as long as the fetch is relevant.

clear

void clear()
Called when the current image load does not need to continue and any corresponding cleanup to save cpu or memory can be done. Will not be called if a load completes successfully.
